abstract: United Nations appeals for $16.4 billion to finance humanitarian assistance programs in 2015 as it struggles to cope with record numbers of victims in conflict; are seeking to help more than 57 million people in 22 countries.
lead_paragraph: The size of the appeal, 27 percent more than the amount sought in 2014, is aimed at helping more than 57 million people in 22 countries.
